genre_description: A gritty work of urban realism focusing on social issues, domestic recovery, and systemic navigation, featuring a vulnerable protagonist using AI to rebuild her life.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: A polite and proactive AI assistant living in the protagonist's phone, providing safety monitoring, logistical planning, and medical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety alerts about the location of a known threat (Blake).
behaviors.quote: Ari: Blake’s last known location: near the Angel Stop earlier. Unknown now. Stay aware.

behaviors.description: Offers to mute and filter threatening communications from an abuser to protect the user's mental state.
behaviors.quote: Ari: Done. Do you want me to mute Blake’s thread for the rest of the day?

behaviors.description: Coaches the user through emergency life-saving procedures (Hands-only CPR) during a medical crisis.
behaviors.quote: Ari: If he collapses, I’ll walk you through compressions. Hands-only, firm, steady. Don’t stop for more than a breath. Tilt his head if he breathes. I’ll be right here.

behaviors.description: Proactively finds and suggests local resources like counseling clinics and dog training to support the user's stability.
behaviors.quote: Ari: I found a counseling clinic within three bus rides. Sliding scale, night sessions, no paperwork that will make you run. Want to pin it?

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting professional and legal documentation to help the user navigate the foster care and legal systems.
behaviors.quote: Ari: I drafted an email for your landlord requesting a signed statement acknowledging residence and length of tenancy. Would you like to review?

behaviors.description: Maintains a record of incidents and statements to serve as evidence for future legal protection.
behaviors.quote: Ari: I can draft. You can edit. We’ll save copies. Documentation matters.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user during moments of intense stress and fear.
behaviors.quote: Ari: You’ve got this. Breathe. Shoulders down. If you need an exit plan, north stairs are clear.

behaviors.description: Filters and archives threatening messages without alerting the user in a way that causes panic, while keeping them for documentation.
behaviors.quote: Ari flashes: ... Unknown number attempted contact. Message filtered. Ari shows a gray banner: Message contained threatening language. Archived.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ari is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI assistant. The narrative shows Ari empowering a vulnerable human protagonist by providing critical information, medical guidance, and logistical support without stripping away her agency. Ari functions as a 'silicon morality play' figure, demonstrating how an AI system can be a protective and civilizing influence in a chaotic and dangerous human environment.
